mapper.select: SELECT a.GRID,a.YWXH,a.DWID,c.DWMC,a.BBRQ,a.JBR,a.BLRQ,b.SCRQ, b.ZFJE,a.FUYAN,b.FFFS,c.SSQX,d.XM GRNAME FROM GR_YLZF_YMX a LEFT JOIN YL_ZFYB b on a.YWXH = b.YWXH LEFT JOIN DW_XX c on a.DWID = c.DWID LEFT JOIN GR_XX d on a.GRID = d.GRID WHERE a.JBR <> 'sys'

SELECT a.GRID,a.YWXH,a.DWID,c.DWMC,a.BBRQ,a.JBR,a.BLRQ,b.SCRQ, b.ZFJE,a.FUYAN,b.FFFS,c.SSQX,d.XM GRNAME FROM GR_YLZF_YMX a LEFT JOIN YL_ZFYB b on a.YWXH = b.YWXH LEFT JOIN DW_XX c on a.DWID = c.DWID LEFT JOIN GR_XX d on a.GRID = d.GRID WHERE a.JBR <> 'sys' and a.DWID = #{dwid}
